document_data.mainbody:
Delzouns Fist was a magical dwarven warhammer +5, designed for the purpose of being thrown.
Whoever wielded the hammer was imbued with strength comparable to that given by a girdle of hill giant strength. It was also capable of protecting its wielder from spells cast at them, similar to the effect of a ring of spell turning.
Within one to three weeks of owning the hammer, two minor and one major malevolent effects would begin to manifest for the wielder. The major effect would only begin to occur after the first instance of it being used against a being that wasnt any form of of evil alignment.
Delzouns Fist was created by the dwarf of the same name, the founder of the kingdom Delzoun. He was said to have wielded the hammer until the day he died.
